parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel binds or sticks in the direction of the turn

requiring the driver to make an exaggerated movement to return to proper steering; the steering wheel does not return to center without driver intention; the vehicle pulls to one side or veers off the road; the steering feels unresponsive or has a loss of power assist; the vehicle is difficult to control
especially on highways or exit ramps.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Lane Keeping Assist system can cause the vehicle to deviate from its intended path, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle fights the driver's control
forcing the vehicle out of its lane; the LKA system does not disengage properly
requiring the driver to take drastic measures to regain control; the vehicle is difficult to control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failures can cause loss of control, accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Tires develop bubbles in the sidewalls; tires are difficult to control
especially on highways; road noise is excessive; low-profile tires may be the cause of these issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning system can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The AC stops blowing cold air or has minimal blowing pressure after several hours of driving
system freezes and operates normally after the vehicle has been stopped for 30-45 minutes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The turbocharger oil pipe leak can cause the vehicle to smoke, shut off while driving, and pose a fire hazard, leading to accidents or injuries.
The failure of the door lock and handle can cause occupants to be trapped in the vehicle during an emergency, leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The driver-side rear passenger door will not open
automatic locks and handles do not release the door.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sticking of the steering wheel can cause loss of control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel sticks in a turned position

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Continental tires can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries due to sidewall blowouts or bubbles.
The failure of the heating and ventilation system can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Heat flows to the front window vents instead of the feet when set to feet exclusively
causes severe headaches and dryness to the face.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Continental ProContact TX Tire Sidewall Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sidewall failure of Continental ProContact TX tires can lead to sudden loss of tire pressure, blowouts, and accidents, posing a significant risk to vehicle occupants and other road users.
symptoms: often resulting in the need for replacement.
